🏳️‍⚧️ #LGBwiththeT 🏳️‍🌈 #LGBTQIA 🏆 Award-winning news service established in 2002 to cover Harry Potter, now reporting on the demise of JK Rowling's legacy.

Since 2020 — and now in our twenty-second year — we've been following the disturbing links between JKR's anti-LGBTQ+ bigotry and far-right, conservative & religious groups and their rhetoric.

Today, we advocate a boycott of all of Rowling's work, since she views it as tacit support for her bigoted positions.

Smaller posts surface images, books, audio, and film (sourced from places like Internet Archive, Library of Congress, The Met, Rijksmusuem, Wellcome, etc.) — and we've also 300+ long-form essays (✍️ submissions welcome!)

Here we'll mostly be tooting about content on our site. 🎺
